room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We did this for my son's birthday party and it was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Thanks for the great fun this weekend!! Both rooms were well designed and challenging. Can't wait for the other two rooms to open!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Had such a great time!! Creative, interactive, awesome staff. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Went with a group of 8 and got down to, literally, the last second before getting out. We had such a fantastic time! Definitely a unique experience and so much fun. Can't wait to do it again!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: What an amazing night- did the office escape with my family and another, random, party. Was a hilarious night, a great fast-paced activity that everyone can feel part of. Will be coming back for another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My family of 8 did The Dig. It was awesome. I'd definitely recommend it. Lots of fun for everyone, and we got out!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My group of friends and I participated in The Dig scenario. I was incredibly impressed with how great the scene was. It was just a great presentation and I felt as if I was on an adventure in an Indiana Jones movie. I think the puzzles were great too, they were varied so thay everyone in the group had something to contribute. I can't wait to come back!
